hero.subtitle: Mountain Magic, Sea Charm
hero.description: Your journey begins here – explore sunny beaches, snowy peaks, and unforgettable adventures in Russia's premier destination

about.title: About resorts
about.description: From Black Sea beaches to mountain health retreats, Krasnodar region offers a year-round escape for every traveler. Rejuvenate in mineral spas, hike coastal cliffs, or ski the slopes of the Caucasus – all within a single destination.

coast.title: Coast & Mountains
coast.heading: Are you ready to explore the only place in Russia where beaches meet mountains?
coast.description: Leave the city noise behind and discovera land where Black Sea breezes meet alpine peaks. Krasnodar region offers  year-round getaways, from wellnessspas to ski resorts – all infused with local soul and sunshine

kuban.title: Kuban Journey
kuban.subtitle: Curated by locals, loved by travelers

brands.description1: United by place. Connected by purpose. A shared journey shaped by a thousand hands.
brands.description2: Building the future of travel together. Trusted by leaders in tourism, hospitality, and innovation.

slide.description: Peach & cherry bloom in Gulkivichi gardens
